flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: If you want to create a kids' pinball that isn't a real pinball machine, then this project is for you. There are no bumpers, slingshot, pinball fingers, sound, etc.
guide.introduction_rendered: If you want to create a kids' pinball that isn't a real pinball machine, then this project is for you. There are no bumpers, slingshot, pinball fingers, sound, etc.

lines.text: Here is an example of a simple pinball game for kids.
lines.text_raw: Here is an example of a simple pinball game for kids.

lines.text: Materials
lines.text_raw: Materials

lines.text: 1= Nails
lines.text_raw: 1= Nails

lines.text: 2= Elastic or rubber bands
lines.text_raw: 2= Elastic or rubber bands

lines.text: 3= Small and medium dowels
lines.text_raw: 3= Small and medium dowels

lines.text: 4= Big stick
lines.text_raw: 4= Big stick

lines.text: 5= Plank
lines.text_raw: 5= Plank

lines.text: Tools
lines.text_raw: Tools

lines.text: 1= Wood glue
lines.text_raw: 1= Wood glue

lines.text: 2= Felt-tip marker (e.g., for CD/DVD)
lines.text_raw: 2= Felt-tip marker (e.g., for CD/DVD)

lines.text: 3= Pen
lines.text_raw: 3= Pen

lines.text: 4= Hammer
lines.text_raw: 4= Hammer

lines.text: 5= Saw
lines.text_raw: 5= Saw

lines.text: 6= Ruler
lines.text_raw: 6= Ruler

lines.text: First, measure the plank's width with the ruler and mark this length on the big stick.
lines.text_raw: First, measure the plank's width with the ruler and mark this length on the big stick.

lines.text: Saw the big stick to the same length as the width of the plank.
lines.text_raw: Saw the big stick to the same length as the width of the plank.

lines.text: After the stick is cut to length, sand it smooth with sandpaper.
lines.text_raw: After the stick is cut to length, sand it smooth with sandpaper.

lines.text: Now put some wood glue on the stick and glue it to the back of the plank at one end.
lines.text_raw: Now put some wood glue on the stick and glue it to the back of the plank at one end.

lines.text: When the glue has dried, turn the plank over and draw the design of your pinball game on the top. Here is an example.
lines.text_raw: When the glue has dried, turn the plank over and draw the design of your pinball game on the top. Here is an example.

lines.text: Hammer in the nails, following your design. Be careful not to hit your fingers!
lines.text_raw: Hammer in the nails, following your design. Be careful not to hit your fingers!

lines.text: Mark the dowels for length, cut them and glue them to the plank.
lines.text_raw: Mark the dowels for length, cut them and glue them to the plank.

lines.text: You can create a banister as shown.
lines.text_raw: You can create a banister as shown.

lines.text: Here is a video tutorial for creating this item.
lines.text_raw: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejUKTVHXl3c|Here] is a video tutorial for creating this item.

lines.text: When the glue has dried, you can embellish your design with the felt-tip marker.
lines.text_raw: When the glue has dried, you can embellish your design with the felt-tip marker.

lines.text: Now stretch the rubber bands around the nails to create bumpers and the launcher.
lines.text_raw: Now stretch the rubber bands around the nails to create bumpers and the launcher.

lines.text: You can add bumpers along the banister with nails and rubber bands as shown.
lines.text_raw: You can add bumpers along the banister with nails and rubber bands as shown.

lines.text: Now your kids' pinball is finished!
lines.text_raw: Now your kids' pinball is finished!

lines.text: To play with the kids' pinball you have two choices:
lines.text_raw: To play with the kids' pinball you have two choices:

lines.text: A geomag ball
lines.text_raw: A geomag ball

lines.text: An electromag ball
lines.text_raw: An electromag ball
